text: Podgornoye () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Chapayevsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 566 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 23 km from Mrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Podgornoye, Republic of Bashkortostan
